category.text: $course$/eur-inferential_statistics-107-en-wooclap/Inferential Statistics/Parametric Techniques/ANOVA/ANOVA F-test, Inferential Statistics/Parametric Techniques/ANOVA/Post-hoc test

questiontext.text: Under what circumstances are post-hoc tests necessary?

generalfeedback.text: Post-hoc tests are only necessary when you reject the null hypothesis in a study with more than 2 different treatments.

answer.text: When you reject the null hypothesis in a study with 2 different treatments
When you do not reject the null hypothesis in a study with more than 2 different treatments
When you do not reject the null hypothesis in a study with 2 different treatments
When you reject the null hypothesis in a study with more than 2 different treatments
